name: Together, We're Better
description:
Lefty and Righty are living puzzle peices. They can combine and separate by pressing CTRL.  They can double jump and dash when combined so remember, together is better!

Controls: Lefty -   A,D=Move W= Jump   Righty- Left, Right= Move Up=Jump (arrow keys)   Together- A,D= move Space=Jump Shift=Dash Connect/Disconnect= CTRL

Have Fun!
